name: Speedrunner 2
description:
Complete the levels as fast as possible!

Source code: https://github.com/eboatwright/Speedrunner2

Controls: (Controller setup is Xbox. Will vary for other controllers)
  • Move left: Left arrow, A, left controller stick left, D-pad left
  • Move right: Right arrow, D, left controller stick right, D-pad right
  • Jump: Up arrow, W, controller B, D-pad up
  • Enter door: Down arrow, S, right controller trigger
  • Respawn at last checkpoint: R, controller X
  • Restart level: T, controller Y
  • Back to Hub / Menu: Escape, left controller trigger
Leaderboard in community tab!

(In-game score saving only works on desktop versions)
